title: Problems with my resolution settings
body: 1. Guys please help me. I've set my resolution too high and now i can't go to game to change it back. Reinstall game didn't work. I tried to set that in Game.CFG but i don't have there anything about resolution. Please help me i don't know what to do.

replies.body:
No worries, you can restore your resolution to default by resetting your config settings.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if it helps!
